story.title: My Story
story.heading: The Journey So Far
story.content: I'm a Mechanical Engineering student at Middle East Technical University (METU). My journey in engineering started early — studying aircraft maintenance in high school, working at TUSAŞ on projects like the F-35 and GÖKBEY Helicopter, and earning an associate degree in Aircraft Technology from Gazi University.
story.content2: Alongside my engineering studies, I discovered a passion for building mobile apps. Using Flutter and AI-augmented workflows, I'm developing Focus Space — a gamified productivity app — under the Volitan Labs brand. My goal is to combine engineering precision with creative software development.
